title: Baked Creamed Corn
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen corn kernels, thawed
½ cup crushed buttery round crackers
method: Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Lightly grease an 8-inch square casserole dish.

Step 2: Melt butter and cream cheese in a saucepan over medium heat; add chicken bouillon and stir to dissolve. Mix in corn and season with pepper, nutmeg, and salt. Stir in cream. Transfer mixture to the prepared casserole dish. Sprinkle with cheese and top with crackers.
Step 3: Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, about 20 minutes.
